content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? What service do you need help with?
Hi, um, I need some electrical work done. But I, I’m not sure if I should schedule yet.
No worries! Can I get your name to help start your service request? I can also answer any questions you have about our electrical services.
Um, maybe I shouldn’t give my name yet. I’m waiting to hear from my insurance if they’ll cover it. I don’t wanna book anything until I know for sure.

That makes perfect sense! Feel free to reach out once you’ve heard back from your insurance, and we’ll be happy to help you schedule your electrical service. Can I answer any other questions about the process or our services for you in the meantime?
No, thanks. I’ll just wait and see what they say first.
reason: Customer is waiting for insurance approval before scheduling.
